element-citation.article-title: Antibacterial mode of action of Cudrania tricuspidata fruit essential oil, affecting membrane permeability and surface characteristics of food-borne pathogens

ref.mixed-citation: Bajpai, V.K., Sharma, A., Baek, K.H., 2013. Antibacterial mode of action of Cudrania tricuspidata fruit essential oil, affecting membrane permeability and surface characteristics of food-borne pathogens. Food Control. 32, 582-590.
